snippet: The leader of a United Nations nuclear inspection delegation reported progress on Friday in negotiations with Iran regarding its nuclear energy work and said another meeting was planned for Jan. 16.
abstract: United Nations nuclear inspection officials report progress in negotiations with Iran regarding its nuclear energy work, but say Iranians have not allowed inspectors to visit military site where nuclear weapons components may have been tested.
lead_paragraph: The leader of a United Nations nuclear inspection delegation reported progress on Friday in negotiations with Iran regarding its nuclear energy work and said another meeting was planned for Jan. 16.
